H0.text: Photosynthesis is the process done by bacteria that makes them important producers in aquatic ecosystems.

H1.text: Maturation is the process performed by bacteria that makes them important producers in aquatic ecosystems.

H2.text: Infection is the process done by bacteria that makes them important producers in aquatic ecosystems.

H3.text: Reproduction is the process done by bacteria that makes them important producers in aquatic ecosystems.

A4.text: Cyanobacteria remain critical to marine ecosystems as primary producers of oxygen in oceanic gyres, as agents of biological nitrogen fixation, and, in modified form, as the plastids of marine algae.
